meanings.definition: The runic alphabet used by Germanic peoples before the adoption of the Latin alphabet.
meanings.sent1: Learning about futhork helps us understand ancient writing systems.
meanings.sent2: Historians study futhork to learn about early Germanic cultures.
meanings.sent3: The teacher wrote her name in futhork on the board for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the museum, the futhork inscriptions on the stones seemed to whisper ancient secrets.
meanings.sent5: The intricate symbols of futhork look like a secret code waiting to be deciphered.

meanings.definition: To write or inscribe using the runic alphabet known as futhork.
meanings.sent1: I will futhork my name on this wooden tablet.
meanings.sent2: People used to futhork messages on stones for communication.
meanings.sent3: She decided to futhork a message on the tree trunk for a playful prank.
meanings.sent4: His words futhorked on the paper like ancient magic spells.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully futhorked the intricate design onto the shield.
